name: So Much Stuff 3: Odds & Ends
description:
Play So Much Stuff 3: Odds & Ends and dive into a delightful journey of sorting through an array of beautiful themes, clearing out a multitude of items and trinkets.



In this new set of beautifully created hidden object scenes, you will sort through unique odds & ends! Feel the satisfaction of organizing and decluttering! Sort through fun and interesting new themes and play a whole new set of mini-games!

Features

  • Play over 100 games!
  • Downloadable wallpapers
  • Full soundtrack and music player
  • Make gameplay simpler with Help and Hint functions!

Collector's Edition

  • includes 8 extra themes
  • 18 Downloadable Wallpapers
  • Music player
  • 1 more collection room

Sit back, relax, and indulge in a diverse selection of engaging mini-games such as jigsaws, find the difference, and click to swaps!
